name: Candy Mania Match 3 Blast Puzzle
description:
Candy Mania Match 3 Blast Puzzle is Super-fast, hyper-addictive and mega-exciting ! The ultimate match 3 mania competition!

Play the most addictive king of all match-3 game for free today!

Epic adventures of await you in the lands of Candy Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond.

Candy Mania Match 3 Blast Puzzle is a world full of sweet candy in this wonderful miracles adventure!

Clash the candy a path by switcher away a group of match-3 or more diamonds and clash and crush to reach a target score.

Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.

Candy Mania Match 3 Blast Puzzle is completely free to play Stay tuned for fast, exciting and challenging features of this mania game of candy.

The ultimate arcade match-3 royake game! Play for FREE now!

Feature of Candy Mania Match 3 Blast Puzzle

● Bright and colorful graphics
● Color bursts, line blasts and dynamite to lend a helping hand
● Unlock boosters and special treasures hidden beneath the ground tiles!
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
● Over 250 levels to complete filled with wondrous delights!
